Valverde: "Griezmann? No m'agrada parlar d'indiscutibles"
El tècnic també ha destacat "la importància de guanyar fora de casa", on el Barça va fallar a l'inici de curs

01 Nov 2019, 14:41

Ernesto Valverde ha definit el Llevant, rival d'aquest dissabte del Barça (16 h, Movistar LaLiga) com un rival "que intenta pressionar alt i que té moltes solucions ofensives, que t'ataca amb molts jugadors i que, si et pren la pilota, té un contraatac fort, amb jugadors com Hernani o Morales". L'entrenador blaugrana també ha parlat del lideratge, després d'un inici de temporada complicat fora de casa. "En alguns moments no vam estar bé, en d'altres no vam tenir fortuna, però hem recuperat posicions. És fonamental tirar endavant els partits fora de casa, que és on vam fallar la principi".



Valverde també ha parlat de Griezmann. "És un jugador que està entrant regularment en l'onze i que ho seguirà fent si segueix complint amb les expectatives. No m'agrada parlar de discutibles i indiscutibles". També ha parlat d'Umtiti, que des del 2018 no encadena dos partits seguits: "Fa temps que arrossega problemes físics. A veure si ho podem solucionar entre tots d'una vegada per totes. Després, s'haurà de guanyar el lloc, perquè Lenglet està a un gran nivell, és molt fiable i és un gran professional". Valverde també s'ha desfet en elogis cap a De Jong: "És un jugador que ens va molt bé. Ens dona molta frescor en el joc, defensivament ens ajuda, té un gran físic i és molt jove, això vol dir que encara ens pot donar més". 
"Ansu Fati està en un procés llarg d'aprenentatge" 
El tècnic blaugrana també ha parlat d'Ansu Fati, que contra el Valladolid va tornar a ser titular amb el primer equip un mes després. "No em penedeixo que estigui amb nosaltres. Acaba de fer 17 anys. El seu debut va generar moltes expectatives per com va ser, però està en un procés d'aprenentatge que necessita temps: aprendre a dominar el ritme dels partits, gestionar el físic... És molt jove, està creixent i ha d'anar seguint un aprenentatge". 
D'altra banda, l'entrenador blaugrana també ha explicat que no sabia que els futbolistes havien ofert retocar-se el contracte i ajornar part del cobrament del seu salari per facilitar el retorn de Neymar, tal com va explicar Piqué dimecres en una entrevista a la Cadena SER, i ha saltat el tema fent broma, dient que a ell "no l'hi van proposar". També ha afirmat que no li preocupa que el central català dediqui bona part del seu temps a l'organització de la Copa Davis, perquè el veu centrat en el Barça.

Valverde: "Griezmann? I do not like talking about undisputed"
The coach also highlighted "the importance of winning away from home", where Barça failed at the beginning of the year

01 Nov 2019, 14:41

Ernesto Valverde has defined Levante, the rival of Barça's Saturday (16:00 p.m., Movistar LaLiga) as a rival "that tries to put pressure high and has many offensive solutions that attack you with many players and that if you take the Ball, it has a strong counterattack, with players like Hernani or Morales. " Barça coach also spoke of leadership, after a difficult start to the season outside the home. "At some moments we were not right, in others we did not have the fortune, but we have recovered positions. It is essential to move the games away from home, which is where we failed the principle."



Valverde also spoke about Griezmann. "He is a player who is entering regularly in eleven and will continue doing it if he continues to meet expectations. I do not like talking about debatable and indisputable." He also talked about Umtiti, which since 2018 does not chain two games in a row: "It has been a long time since it drags physical problems. Let's see if we can solve it all together once and for all. Then, you have to win the site, Because Lenglet is at a great level, it is very reliable and is a great professional. " Valverde also praised De Jong: "He is a player that works great for us. He gives us a lot of coolness in the game, defensively helps us, he has a great physicist and is very young, that means we still have can give more ".
"Ansu Fati is in a long process of learning"
The Blaugrana coach also spoke of Ansu Fati, who against Valladolid returned to the start with the first team a month later. "I do not regret that he is with us. He was just 17 years old. His debut generated a lot of expectations about how he was, but he is in a learning process that needs time: to learn to dominate the rhythm of the games, manage the physicist ... He is very young, he is growing and must follow a learning ".
On the other hand, the coach also explained that he did not know that the players had offered to retouch the contract and to postpone part of the collection of his salary to facilitate the return of Neymar, as Piqué explained Wednesday in an interview with The SER Chain, and has jumped the issue by joking, saying that he "did not propose it." He also stated that he is not worried that the central Catalan dedicates much of his time to the organization of the Davis Cup, because he is focused on Barça.
